title: So this is how my ranked games are going....
body:
There is a clear pattern to how my ranked games seem to go.

Starts out fine... one person starts feeding, that person starts blaming someone else (usually me because I'm supporting) I mute them game goes to shit because one person decided to be a demoralizing c*nt.

Is this the same for anyone else? 

As soon as someone starts giving the rest of the team grief the game is as good as over. If people just put their heads down and play instead of talking shit we might actually stand a chance, but people never do that.  Even if i mute the rest of the team fights.

So frustrating -_-

replies.body: Welcome to solo queue, enjoy your stay

yes i also get bad team mates in 100% of my matches making them impossible to win, when i carry and go 54/0/500 and still lose wtf, but then i sometimes carry and win, i should be challenger but my noob team mates make me lose 100% of matches gg
Didn't say any of that. lol
Only ever blame lag on skype ;-) Not in game.

Life is really hard as a support ... you almost get blamed for everything even when it is obviously the other players fault for example my teammate have really bad positioning and keeps tanking minions. The other thing which sucks about being a support is when you take CS you get blamed and if you killed an enemy u get blamed (more stupid thing is when i don't attempt to kill the enemy and teammate doesn't get the kill i get blamed again for bad supporting) which is just so annoying because :
1) Support lacks gold to buy items 
2) Most Gold go to wards and visions and other support items such as {{item:2045}} 
3)Very team dependent 
4) No damage because no ($ for) damage items
5)Gets negative comments for buying damage item on support 
5)When team refuse to teamwork and tries to solo because he/she thinks he/she is fed and ends up feeding and then i get blamed  (rarely happens but hey its still an issue)

Yeap, ranked sure does suck. Played this game where all my team were winning their lanes, then this Master Yi on our team started feeding, was 2/10 after 20mins. He started blaming our jungler, who was doing quite well grabbing drag, stealing the enemy buffs, and made rounds to help me in bot with my supp and then our mid laner. Like bro, Yi fed a Teemo :s we ended up winning but that was one hard game...He even started blaming our supp! Because apparently they had been supporting me too much, like what? I was adc...

Oh hey, I played with you earlier. I was the Swain in one of your games, and I completely agree with you.

I hope I wasn't one of the demoralizing people, although I was a bit angry in that game since the same thing happens over and over to me in ranked.
Nah you were fine.... but same thing happened that game. :-\
